title: A Higher-Order Vampire (Short Paper)
abstract:
The support for higher-order reasoning in the Vampire theorem prover has
recently been completely reworked. This rework consists of new theoretical
ideas, a new implementation, and a dedicated strategy schedule. The theoretical
ideas are still under development, so we discuss them at a high level in this
paper. We also describe the implementation of the calculus in the Vampire
theorem prover, the strategy schedule construction and several empirical
performance statistics.
subjects: Computing Research Repository/Logic in Computer Science
